Title: Improper Verification of Cryptographic Signature in aws-encryption-sdk-javascript
Description: This advisory addresses several LOW severity issues with streaming signed messages and restricting processing of certain types of invalid messages. This ESDK supports a streaming mode where callers may stream the plaintext of signed messages before the ECDSA signature is validated.
AffectedVersions: All versions before 1.9.0, all versions starting from 2.0.0 before 2.2.0
NotImpacted: All versions starting from 1.9.0 before 2.0.0, all versions starting from 2.2.0
